content.text:
# Roding (ward)

|frame=yes|plain=yes|frame-align=center|frame-width=250|frame-height=245}}
|caption           = Roding ward boundaries from 2002 to 2018
|blank1_name       = ONS code
|blank1_info       = 00BCGQ (2002–2018)
|blank2_name       = GSS code
|blank2_info       = E05000511 (2002–2018)
}}
Roding was an electoral ward in the London Borough of Redbridge from 1978 to 2018. The ward was first used in the 1978 elections and last used for the 2014 elections. It returned three councillors to Redbridge London Borough Council.
2002–2018 Redbridge council elections
There was a revision of ward boundaries in Redbridge in 2002.
2016 by-election
The by-election took place on 5 May 2016, following the resignation of Sarah Blaber.
2014 election
The election took place on 22 May 2014.
2010 election
The election on 6 May 2010 took place on the same day as the United Kingdom general election.
2006 election
The election took place on 4 May 2006.
2002 election
The election took place on 2 May 2002.
1978–2002 Redbridge council elections
|frame=yes|text=Roding ward boundaries from 1978 to 2002}}
1998 election
1994 election
1990 election
The election took place on 3 May 1990.
1987 by-election
The by-election took place on 28 May 1987, following the death of Denis Stephens.
1986 election
1982 election
1978 election
